displayName.english: A journey of a thousand miles ends with a stubbed toe
displayName.japanese: 千里の道も、足元から崩れる

description.english: Killed by Zoey's flying kick
description.japanese: サイに蹴り殺される

displayName.japanese: マウスくらい持ってるでしょ？

description.english: Lost a shirt fight to Zoey
description.japanese: 服の取り合いでサイに負ける

displayName.english: Success is fine, until someone's missing
displayName.schinese: 成功不可怕，缺谁谁尴尬
displayName.tchinese: 成功不可怕，缺誰誰尷尬
displayName.japanese: 成功は怖くない、仲間はずれが怖い
displayName.koreana: 성공은 두렵지 않다, 빠진 사람만 민망할 뿐

description.english: Watched your bro succeed
description.japanese: 兄弟の成功を目撃する

description.english: Zapped by a rogue switch
description.japanese: スイッチで感電する

description.english: Pried Ivy Wong's key out with a crowbar
description.tchinese: 用撬棍勾出汪雨桐的鑰匙
description.japanese: バールで汪雨桐の鍵を盗む

displayName.japanese: そろそろ補給が必要ね

description.english: Failed the long jump challenge multiple times
description.schinese: 在跳远挑战中多次失败
description.tchinese: 在跳遠挑戰中多次失敗
description.japanese: 走り幅跳びチャレンジで何度も失敗する

displayName.english: Pretty views come second, safety first
displayName.japanese: 景色は二の次、安全第一

description.english: Nearly fell off a ladder
description.japanese: 梯子から落ちそうになる

displayName.english: I don't bow to anyone but myself
displayName.japanese: 誰の助けも借りない、自分だけを信じる

description.english: Let both waves crash into Ivy Wong
description.schinese: 海浪涌来时什么都不做
description.tchinese: 兩次海浪都不管汪雨桐
description.japanese: 二度も汪雨桐を助けない
description.koreana: 파도가 두 번 밀려왔는데 안우미를 방치

description.english: Collected every shell and found the cat's eye snail
description.schinese: 集齐所有贝壳并找到大猫眼螺
description.tchinese: 集齊所有貝殼並找到大貓眼螺
description.japanese: 全ての貝殻を集め、大猫目螺を見つける
description.koreana: 모든 조개껍데기를 모으고 고양이 눈 소라를 찾음

description.english: Heard a strange sonic wave
description.japanese: 奇妙な音波を聞く

description.english: Held the stage with a song for Ki Gan
description.schinese: 展示歌喉帮甘琪撑住场子
description.tchinese: 展示歌喉幫甘琪撐住場子
description.japanese: 歌唱力を発揮し、カンキのピンチを救う

description.english: Successfully convinced Zoey
description.japanese: サイを説得することに成功する

displayName.japanese: 誰も欠けちゃいけない

description.english: Got all three girls to the BBQ
description.schinese: 烧烤局凑齐所有三位女孩
description.tchinese: 燒烤局湊齊所有三位女孩
description.japanese: バーベキューで3人の女の子全員集合
description.koreana: 꼬치구이 파티에 세 명의 여성 캐릭터를 다 데려오기

description.english: Felt a surge of mysterious power
description.schinese: 感受到一股强大的力量
description.tchinese: 感受到一股強大的力量
description.japanese: 強大な力を感じる

displayName.english: You won't do it? Somebody will
displayName.japanese: 君がやらなくても、他のパルがやるさ
displayName.koreana: 네가 안 해도 할 사람은 많아

description.english: Botched the negotiation with Erica Luo
description.japanese: 羅悦可との値段交渉が決裂する

displayName.japanese: バーベキューマスター

description.english: Grilled the perfect piece of meat
description.japanese: 最高の肉を焼き上げる

description.english: Snapped the perfect photo in one go
description.schinese: 一次就拍出最好的照片
description.tchinese: 一次就拍出最好的照片
description.japanese: 一発で最高の写真を撮る

description.english: Delivered a whole crate of wine to the finish line
description.schinese: 将一箱酒完好运到终点
description.tchinese: 將一箱酒完好運到終點
description.japanese: ワインを一箱無傷でゴールまで運ぶ

description.english: Tried healing with hand sanitizer
description.japanese: ハンドソープで回復を試みる

description.english: Lost the option, thanks to a bro slap
description.japanese: 選択肢が兄弟ぶっ飛ばされた

description.english: Didn't share the cake with any girl
description.schinese: 蛋糕不分给任何一个女孩
description.tchinese: 蛋糕不分給任何一個女孩
description.japanese: どの女の子にもケーキを分け与えない

description.english: Played matchmaker for a bro
description.japanese: 兄弟の仲を取り持つ

description.english: Rolled dice in Ivy Wong's lab
description.schinese: 在汪雨桐实验室玩骰子
description.tchinese: 在汪雨桐實驗室玩骰子
description.japanese: 汪雨桐の研究室でサイコロを振る

displayName.japanese: 色のことは私にお任せください

description.english: Met every one of Mina Xu's color demands
description.schinese: 满足所有许曼曼的调色要求
description.tchinese: 滿足所有許曼曼的調色要求
description.japanese: 許曼曼の全ての色調整の要求を満たす

displayName.japanese: 詐欺防止アプリをダウンロードしてください

description.japanese: プロのチームを信じることを選ぶ

description.english: Ended up in jail
description.japanese: 刑務所に入る

description.english: Sabotaged Zoey in a motorbike race
description.schinese: 比赛骑摩托时干扰左伊
description.tchinese: 比賽騎摩托時干擾左伊
description.japanese: バイクレースでサイを妨害する

description.english: No, no, nooo!
description.japanese: いやだ、いやだ、いやだー

displayName.english: Made in China, trusted by all
displayName.japanese: メイドインチャイナ、安心の品質

description.english: Failed at lockpicking
description.japanese: 鍵開けに失敗する

description.english: Caught the signal and ditched the guard
description.japanese: 暗号を受信し、警備員をまく

description.english: Resisted the urge to swing it
description.japanese: 振り回したい衝動を抑える

description.english: Convinced Zoey again
description.japanese: 再びサイを説得することに成功する

displayName.english: A scent that puts your mind at ease

description.tchinese: 在羅悅可臥室找到自己的衣服
description.japanese: 羅悦可の部屋で自分の服を見つける

displayName.japanese: タクティカルゴーグル起動

description.english: Held your ground like a pro
description.japanese: 持ち場を離れない
description.koreana: 자리를 굳건히 지키고 절대 빈둥거리지 않기

description.english: Sabotaged the rival guesthouse
description.japanese: 相手の民宿に仕返しする

description.english: Let Ki Gan sleep in naturally

displayName.english: Swear on the lamp, I got an electric shock
displayName.schinese: 我对灯发誓我绝对抽了
displayName.tchinese: 我對燈發誓我絕對抽了

description.english: Got electrocuted fixing a lightbulb
description.japanese: 電球の修理中に感電死する

displayName.english: You just want an excuse to drink

description.english: Got knocked out in Ki Gan's drinking game
description.schinese: 在甘琪的喝酒游戏里醉倒
description.tchinese: 在甘琪的喝酒遊戲裏醉倒
description.japanese: カンキの飲みゲームで酔いつぶれる

description.english: Discovered Erica Luo's real name
description.japanese: 羅悦可の本名を発見する

description.english: Won the grand prize in the spin-the-wheel draw
description.japanese: 福引で特賞を当てる

displayName.english: Guess our childhoods weren't that different
displayName.schinese: 你我的童年好像都一样
displayName.tchinese: 你我的童年好像都一樣
displayName.japanese: 君と私の子供時代は同じみたい

description.english: Guessed every toy from Ki Gan's childhood
description.tchinese: 猜出所有甘琪玩過的童年玩具
description.japanese: カンキが遊んだ全ての子供のおもちゃを当てる

description.english: Stung to death by a hornet
description.japanese: スズメバチに刺されて死ぬ

description.english: Beat Layla Jiang at the rock skipping game
description.schinese: 在打水漂游戏中战胜姜莱
description.tchinese: 在打水漂游戲中戰勝姜萊
description.japanese: 水切りゲームで姜莱に勝利する

description.english: Meditated on the mountain cushion
description.japanese: 山の上の座布団で瞑想する

displayName.english: Feels like someone I used to know
displayName.japanese: どこかで会ったような

description.english: Made them smile, at least this time
description.japanese: 少なくとも今回は、彼女たちを喜ばせる

description.english: Didn't laugh once during Ivy Wong's jokes
description.schinese: 在汪雨桐讲笑话时一直不笑
description.tchinese: 在汪雨桐講笑話時一直不笑
description.japanese: 汪雨桐がジョークを言っても笑わない
description.koreana: 안우미가 웃긴 얘기할 때 쭉 웃지 않는다

description.english: Investigated the rock pile on the lawn
description.japanese: 芝生の上の石積みを調査する

description.english: Insisted on seeing Ivy Wong's wish
description.schinese: 坚持要看汪雨桐写的心愿
description.tchinese: 堅持要看汪雨桐寫的心願
description.japanese: 汪雨桐が書いた願い事を読むことを主張する
description.koreana: 안우미가 쓴 소원을 보겠다고 끝까지 우기기

description.english: Savage clapback to a teammate
description.japanese: 手加減なしにチームメイトに反撃する

description.english: Put Erica Luo to sleep, then snuck off to Mina Xu
description.schinese: 哄睡罗悦可后去找许曼曼
description.tchinese: 哄睡羅悅可後去找許曼曼
description.japanese: 羅悦可を寝かしつけた後、許曼曼に会いに行く

description.english: Found Mina Xu's fitting room on the first try

description.tchinese: 一次就找對許曼曼試衣間
description.japanese: 一発で許曼曼の試着室を見つける

description.english: Turned into a grumpy husband stuck in a lonely boudoir
description.japanese: 深窓の夫となる

description.english: Zero interest in swimsuit beauties
description.japanese: 水着美女に全く興味がない

description.english: Heart raced during the heart-listening moment

description.japanese: 心臓の鼓動を盗聴され、うろたえる

description.japanese: サイの全ての質問に正解する

description.english: Guessed the delivery food correctly
description.japanese: 出前が何か当てる

displayName.english: But was it all worth it?

displayName.koreana: 하지만 이 모든 것이 정말 의미가 있을까?

description.japanese: 胸で岩を砕かれて死ぬ
